0.title: Welcome to MetaCopy
0.content: Dear {username} ,Your account is verified. now you can send message to admin to increase your balance and start trading

1.title: Trade opened
1.content: Your Trade opened at {trade_price} with ticket {trade_ticket} ,you can check it in you open trades.

2.title: Trade closed
2.content: Your Trade closed at {trade_exit} with ticket {trade_ticket}. your profit is {trade_profit}

20.title: Balance increased
20.content: your balance increase by {increase}$. current balance is {balance}$

21.title: Withdraw accept
21.content: Your Withdraw request for {withdraw_amount}$ is accepted and the amount will soon transfered to your bank account

22.title: Withdraw completed
22.content: withdrawal successful. {withdraw_rial} Rial transfered to your bank account

99.title: Account Liquidated
99.content: We are sorry to tell you your account is liquidate. you can no longer trade unless you increase your balance
